name: amazons-game-engine
description: amazons-game-engine is a Typescript chess library that is used for 'the Game of the Amazons' move generation/validation, piece placement/movement, and endgame detection and counting - basically everything but the AI. This package's API has been inspired by 'chess.js'

scripts.patch: tsc && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.minor: tsc && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.major: tsc && npm version major && npm publish

author: Alex Rodriguez
